body_content.explanation: the performer or band (= group of musicians) that performs before the main one in a concert or other performance:
examples: Even the biggest names played their first gigs as support acts.
His wife, who also has a new album out, is the supporting act.

body_content.explanation: a person or thing that helps someone or something be successful, but is considered less important :
examples: She will be the bread winner; he the support act.
The newspaper needs intelligent investment in editorial - all the rest, the marketing and the promotions, is a supporting act.
